segments.text: What kind of personality do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm easy to approach and friendly to everyone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are introverted or extroverted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you more of a follower or a leader ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't agree with someone else's opinion if I think he's wrong , but when I understand his thinking and see he has some good ideas , then I'm very happy to go along with him .
segments.speaker: S2
